org.endeavourhealth.informationmanager.common.transform

Class ReasonerPlus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.endeavourhealth.informationmanager.common.transform.ReasonerPlus

  • public class ReasonerPlus
extends java.lang.Object
    Classifies an ontology using an owl reasoner, generating ISA relationships from a Discovery ontology document. Generates inferred role groups (Snomed pattern) from the existential quntifiers and propogates them to subclasses Generatesi inferred Property groups from the SHACL property definitions and propogates them to subclasses
